data

Class Database

  • java.lang.Object
    • data.Database

  • public class Database
extends java.lang.Object
    The class with the main functionality corresponding to executing queries on the database.

      • queryFloat

        public java.lang.Float queryFloat(java.util.function.Function<java.sql.Connection,java.sql.PreparedStatement> statementMaker,
                                  java.lang.String column)
        Query for a float in the database.
        Parameters:
        statementMaker - Function that takes the Connection with the database and returns a prepared statement to execute.
        column - Column of the resulting data to extract the float from.
        Returns:
        Float received from querying using the preparedstatement made using the statementMaker and extracting the float from the given column.

        Query in the database.
        Parameters:
        statementMaker - Function that takes the Connection with the database and returns a prepared statement to execute.
        Returns:
